extension.mergeNPaste.config.description:
The path to Merge tool. 
replace: %E = EditorFile, %C = ClipboardFile, %M = MergedOutput 
ex(WinMerge): "C:\Program Files (x86)\WinMerge\WinMergeU.exe" %E %C 
ex(KDIFF): "C:\Program Files\KDiff3\KDiff3.exe" %E %C -o %M 
ex(TortoiseGitMerge): "C:\Program Files\TortoiseGit\bin\TortoiseGitMerge.exe" %E %C

Reflect source File to editor. 
replace: %E = EditorFile, %C = ClipboardFile, %M = MergedOutput 
ex: "Reflect clipboard text" = %C
extension.mergeNPaste.message.isSame: EDITOR and CLIPBOARD are the same.
extension.mergeNPaste.message.mergeRefle: Are you sure you want to reflect from MERGED?
extension.mergeNPaste.message.reflectSel: Are you sure you want to reflect from..
extension.mergeNPaste.message.notReflect: Due to changes in the original editor during the comparison, it could not be reflected.
extension.mergeNPaste.message.aboutDiffT: Save and close this tab and it will be reflected in the original editor.
